__e: The Federation has gone too far this time.
So one could say... without being unreasonable, I think, that the Federation is partially responsible for what's happened and therefore, duty bound to correct the situation.
The Trade Federation has destroyed all that we have worked so hard to build.
You understand what the Federation is, don't you? It's important.
Taking help from the Federation is bad enough, but having to take it from that Bajoran terrorist.
If you ask me the key to holding the Federation is Earth.
